title: Season 7...
body: So, who else is going to be playing their final game of league of legends soon?

replies.body: Wait how the hell does this have 2.5k views

You can use an auto refresher to give a bolstered amount of views, as views aren't unique.

EDIT: Which is 100% what happened as this now has 10k views.
Seems too mundane a post to bother with but I suppose it's not exactly difficult to do so.
There is no other way to explain 10k views on OCE boards.

> [{quoted}](name=Seras Dragon,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=cO7Wl8zd,comment-id=000000010000,timestamp=2016-11-10T08:53:07.652+0000)
>
> Seems too mundane a post to bother with but I suppose it's not exactly difficult to do so.

guy probably sat there going "c'mon, someone's bound to post" like a sad %%%%.

EDIT: wow it does...damn that's a bit edgy (for lack of a better term), just got my post from 11 to 22.....
Why? What's wrong with S7? I haven't been following things lately
Don't really get it, as in the plant things in the jungle? I thought those were really cool
Phantiks recently said on stream that he predicts that League will be gone in 5 years time.

You'll be back.

They always come back.
